channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple is buying photo-editing app Pixelmator
item.description: Pixelmator announced on Friday that it is being acquired by Apple. The image-editing platform didn’t discuss what life might look like under the corpo...

item.title: How to make open source software more secure
item.description: Earlier this year, a Microsoft developer realized that someone had inserted a backdoor into the code of open source utility XZ Utils, which is used in...

item.title: The Best Smart Rings, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: A svelte smart ring can track important health metrics and doesn't need to be charged every day.

item.title: The biggest underestimated security threat of today? Advanced persistent teenagers

item.title: New funding rounds confirm that money attracts money

item.title: Black Friday 2024: Tips for Finding the Best Deals From Home
item.description: The biggest retail event of the year has grown into an entire month of sales that ebb and flow. Here’s how to make the most of it.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot

item.title: Election Violence Is Already Here

item.title: What an ‘Airbnbopoly’ Game Says About Silicon Valley’s Standoff With Lina Khan

item.title: AI Will Understand Humans Better Than Humans Do
item.description: Or so says a controversial Stanford researcher, who finds that the latest systems have, against all odds, mastered a high-level cognitive skill.
